smell_analysis.justification: Page 2 ('Diagram: Autode funktsionaalne allsüsteem (Kustuta)') contains a package frame but no internal content or other elements, and the title '(Kustuta)' (Delete) indicates it is an empty or abandoned artifact.
All use cases are connected to actors, either directly or via inclusion relationships.
No duplicate use case names describing the same activity were found.
No distinct elements with the same name were found within the same package scope.
The database schema is normalized; no redundant data copying was detected.
All use cases consistently use the 'Verb + Noun' naming convention.
All states in the state diagram (Page 10) are reachable from the start node.
All actions in the activity diagram (Page 5) are reachable.
Multiplicities are defined on both ends of relationships in the class and database diagrams.
No diagram contains 10 or more central elements.
No element exceeds the threshold of 6 visual connections on a single diagram.
Element spacing is consistent across diagrams.
Use cases and activity actions start with active verbs.
All element names are longer than 3 characters.
Class names are singular and capitalized.
Attribute names start with lowercase letters.
No invalid type prefixes (Hungarian notation) were found on classes or attributes.
